body.name: NZXT N7 Z790 ATX Motherboard - Intel Z790, WiFi 6E, Bluetooth, Integrated I/O Shield - Supports 12th/13th/14th Gen Intel CPUs
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: THE LATEST AND GREATEST: The N7 Z790 includes key features from the NZXT RGB and Fan Controller, allowing intuitive control of six RGB lighting channels and seven fan channels through NZXT CAM.
DESIGN: The N7 Z790 allows for a great look without sacrificing the build experience with an integrated rear I/O and optimally placed headers
STUNNING CRAFTSMANSHIP: Build your dream system with a full metal cover that blends aesthetically with black or white cases for a seamless backdrop for your components
CPU and SOCKET: Socket LGA 1700 compatible with Intel 14th, 13th, and 12th Generation Core i5, i7 and i9 processors
body.description: The N7 Z790 supports Intel's latest CPUs and has everything needed to build a modern system. The full black or white cover blends seamlessly within your build and includes optimally placed headers and built-in fan & lighting controls via NZXT CAM.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 128 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: N7 Z790 Intel Z790 ATX Motherboard with Full Cover, CAM Controls, and Wi-Fi The N7 Z790 supports Intel's latest CPUs and has everything needed to build a modern system. The full black or white cover blends seamlessly within your build and includes optimally placed headers and built-in fan & lighting controls via NZXT CAM. Full cover in black or white with an integrated heat spreader for top-most M.2 slot. Digital RGB lighting control through CAM for numerous preset and custom modes Convenient fan profiles within NZXT CAM for seven independent fan channels Integrated rear I/O shield and efficient layout ensures straightforward setup

The Latest and Greatest The N7 Z790 allows for a great look without sacrificing the build experience with an integrated rear I/O and optimally placed headers. Stunning Craftsmanship Build your dream system with a full metal cover that blends aesthetically with black or white cases for a seamless backdrop for your prized components. Powerful Control The N7 Z790 includes key features from the NZXT RGB and Fan Controller, allowing intuitive control of six RGB lighting channels and seven fan channels through NZXT CAM. Lighting accessories from all manufacturers are supported as well as 5V ARGB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got my motherboard just today. It is going amazing. There was an issue, though, which is basically that no drivers were any good. I had to download WiFi drivers through my phone to a usb c flash drive and then put the drivers into the computer. No RAM issues and it works out of the box with 7950X3D. Firmware was, i believe, 1.1. Love the sleek and the magnetic plates to see the other 2 m.2 drive slots. Thick M.2 Slot heatsink for gen 5 SSD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Paying for Looks
reviews.reviewText: There are plenty of motherboards that have more & better features at this price but dang its beautiful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aesthetic and Functional
reviews.reviewText: The board is by far the most aesthetic available, NZXT absolutely killing it. The UEFI is nicely laid out, ports are all in great spots for cable management, the RGB headers are plentiful.Only downside to this board is they went with a gen 5 pcie x16, but no gen 5 m2 slot. No GPUs actually use gen 5 so it would have been nice for those lanes to go to an m2 instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible design. Don’t buy.
reviews.reviewText: There is a screwed on shield over the primary MVNE slot. It is very tightly screwed and easy to strip and permanently damage. Bad design . Don’t risk buying this and having a good for nothing screw wreck the whole build. Remember this is the same company that made the fire prone H1. Terrible products for years. This is no different.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfecto en funcionalida y estetica.
reviews.reviewText: Exelente producto, pense que por ser una marca no tan reconocida en placas madre tendria mucho pantallazo azul o algo asi, pero hasta el momento 2 meses despues de la compra todo anda normal, fuera de que tiene una estetica impresionantemente bella, exelente conectividad, buena compatibilidad, las compre junto con un ryez 7800x3d y unas ram de fury beast a 6000 Mhz y sin probleamas todo anda perfecto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for White Builds
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Probably the best looking motherboard you can find for the white aesthetic. It has enough features that you won’t feel like it’s lacking anything necessary. I do wish the PCIE slot for the GPU had a button release.. that’s about it though.. more than enough ports and headers on it for what you need. I love the look and functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars GPU fitment issue.
reviews.reviewText: Obviously this motherboard looks good, and has a lot of great functions to it, but the way it is designed caused a fitment issue for my GPU. I have a EVGA 3060 TI, a gpu that is very normal sized, but the shielding on this motherboard prevents it from latching properly, I guarantee with larger GPUs this problem is worse. I resolved this issue by actually shaving off some of the gpu shroud so it would fit better, keyword is better, it still doesn't latch in all the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple and clean board. Nothing too fancy.
reviews.reviewText: Has two 5v 3 pin argb headers, and nzxt's 4 pin headers. I just use the Phantek Nv7 cases built in rgb hub though, since it can power all leds pictured.Has 2.5gb ethernet, so I can use my 1.2gb internet to the fullest, and have room in future if speed goes up more. Haven't used the wifi much to comment on that.***! Make sure you have access to internet and download the proper ethernet and wifi drivers from NZXT's website beforehand, during my windows install I couldn't connect to the internet while plugged in through ethernet. Had to use USB internet tether from my S21 phone. That worked and once I installed the drivers, ethernet and wifi/Bluetooth worked.NZXT's Cam software is...ok I guess. Cannot control my Tforce memory rgb with it, and the options for the 5v 3 pin header settings are a bit hidden. Otherwise the fan control works well enough. I imagine if you are using their other products like Kraken cooler and whatnot, it would be much more useful.

La compre por ese estilo, me gusta mucho, además de todas las características que tiene, sin embargo el envío por parte de Amazon en estos últimos días quedan a deber, ya que otros productos me han llegado dañados. Pero dejando de lado eso y te animas a comprarla no te arrepentirás al final de cuentas lo que importa es el producto y no la caja.
Me encanto el diseño minimalista, pero esperaba que tuviera un poco mas de calidad, algunas partes son muy fagriles, la fabricante de esta motherboard es AsRock y NZXT solo le hace un rebranding

reviews.reviewTitle: 結構いいとおもったが...
reviews.reviewText: 開けた際大丈夫だと思っていたが、マザーボードのIOパネルのカバー部分に薄く、傷があった。残念...
